attributes.action: Create more Special Needs Education school places
attributes.additional_details:
More and more houses are been built in the Wakefield district and there are only 2 Local Authority Special Education Schools.
There are 4 resource centres but not enough to cater for the 1000s of children who are struggling in mainstream school.
attributes.background: Thousands of children with special needs are struggling in mainstream schools and need specialist provision. More school spaces need to be made available for these children.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition we currently have open on this topic:

Fund additional specialist school capacity for children with disabilities & SEN
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600677
